John Cocke

Biography

Career and Research

Awards and Honors
1972 IBM Fellow
1979 Member, National Academy of Engineering
1985 Eckert-Mauchly Award (shared by the ACM and the IEEE Computer Society)
1986 Fellow, American Academy of Arts and Sciences
1987 ACM Turing Award
1988 Honorary Doctor of Science, Duke University
1989 IEEE Computer Society Pioneer Award
1990 IBM John E. Bertram Award for Sustained Excellence
1991 National Medal of Technology
1993 Member, National Academy of Sciences
1994 NEC Foundation Computers & Communications Prize
1994 National Medal of Science
1996 The Franklin Institute's Certificate of Merit
1999 Seymour Cray Computer Science and Engineering Award
2000 the Benjamin Franklin Medal
2002 Fellow of the Computer History Museum
Turing Award of 1987

In memory of A.M. Turing
